resources.string: This mobile application has been developed for project dessertation work (Jan 2023 to May 2023) by Ms. Theja Mohanan K, M.C.A, Department of Computer Science, Pondicherry University, Puducherry, under the guidance of Mrs. G. Jeyakodi, Research Scholar, Pondicherry University, Puducherry, and Dr. P. Shanthi Bala, Associate Professor, Department of Computer Science, Pondicherry University, Pondicherry.
